title: This is the best change Riot has made in years.
body: Making targeted abilities (Pantheon Q, Teemo Q, Cass E, Akali Q, etc.) draw minion aggro. Whoever made this change deserves a raise, now I can play melee matchups vs Ranged undodgable ability poke without wanting to fucking end my life.
